title: scenario.make isn't working
body:
PS D:\BeamNg.Tech_ws\BeamNG.drive-0.23.5.1.12888> python

Python 3.9.9 (tags/v3.9.9:ccb0e6a, Nov 15 2021, 18:08:50) [MSC v.1929 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> from beamngpy import BeamNGpy, Scenario, Vehicle
>>> bng = BeamNGpy('localhost', 64256, home='D:\BeamNg.Tech_ws\BeamNG.drive-0.23.5.1.12888') 
>>> scenario = Scenario('west_coast_usa', 'example')
>>> vehicle = Vehicle('ego_vehicle', model='etk800', licence='PYTHON')
>>> scenario.add_vehicle(vehicle, pos=(-717, 101, 118), rot=None, rot_quat=(0, 0, 0.3826834, 0.9238795))
>>> scenario.make(bng)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "C:\Users\ideas\AppData\Local\Packages\PythonSoftwareFoundation.Python.3.9_qbz5n2kfra8p0\LocalCache\local-packages\Python39\site-packages\beamngpy\scenario.py", line 789, in make   
    self.path = bng.create_scenario(level_name, self.name, prefab, info)
  File "C:\Users\ideas\AppData\Local\Packages\PythonSoftwareFoundation.Python.3.9_qbz5n2kfra8p0\LocalCache\local-packages\PythonythonSoftwareFoundation.Python.3.9_qbz5n2kfra8p0\LocalCache\local-packages\Python39\site-packages\beamngpy\beamng.py", line 375, in message
    self.send(kwargs)  File "C:\Users\ideas\AppData\Local\Packages\PythonSoftwareFoundation.Python.3.9_qbz5n2kfra8p0\LocalCache\local-packages\Python39\site-packages\beamngpy\beamng.py", line 548, in send
    return send_msg(self.skt, data)  File "C:\Users\ideas\AppData\Local\Packages\PythonSoftwareFoundation.Python.3.9_qbz5n2kfra8p0\LocalCache\local-packages\Python39\site-packages\beamngpy\beamngcommon.py", line 238, in send_msg    skt.send(bytes(length, 'ascii'))AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'send'
